name: Blue helmet
description: Blue, Patented side impact protection (PSIP) research-based mandible protection helps reduce the forces from side impacts Fitted liner system with inflatable jaw pads Over liner - removable, moisture-resistant liner cover with properties built-in to protect the product, provides comfort and stability
